id,

train_date = #{trainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update train_laser set train_id = #{trainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, left_laser = #{leftLaser,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, right_laser = #{rightLaser,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, train_date = #{trainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, motor_num = #{motorNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
